cause.description:
in U.S.A. health care cost lots of money, especially people with extreme conditions. did you know that one chemo tretment could cost thousands of dollars? in poor countries helth care is not funded therefore inacurate. one lady i heard a story of had the wrong leg amputated! the wrong leg! so please if you care about people in poor countries or even homeless people in america...join this group
Created by: Richie Colmer Age-13 Lives- Toronto, Ont.
1. all people must have access to free healthcare
cause.mission: make healthcare free in all countries
cause.name: don't privatize OUR hospitals!
